alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Fairfield, northern Westchester and eastern Putnam Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 313 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wingdale to near Danbury. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danbury, Lake Carmel, Sherman, Brewster, Ridgefield, Brookfield, New Fairfield, Patterson, Putnam Lake, Brewster Hill and Peach Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
